dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset of ~167k in-patient hospital admissions from Columbia University Irving Medical Center (CUIMC) from 2020-2023, used for training models to generate hospital course summaries.
dcterms:title: Columbia:2020-2023 Train

dcterms:description: A test dataset consisting of 1,000 admissions from the same time-frame as the training set (2020-2023) for evaluating hospital course summarization models.
dcterms:title: Columbia:2020-2023 Test

dcterms:description: A test dataset consisting of 1,000 admissions from an earlier time period (2010-2014) to evaluate the robustness of summarization methods across different EHR styles.
dcterms:title: Columbia:2010-2014 Test

dcterms:creator: Alistair EW Johnson
Tom J Pollard
Lu Shen
Li-wei H Lehman
Mengling Feng
Mohammad Ghassemi
Benjamin Moody
Peter Szolovits
Leo Anthony Celi
Roger G Mark
dcterms:description: MIMIC-III is a freely accessible critical care database that contains de-identified health data associated with over 40,000 patients who were admitted to critical care units.
dcterms:title: MIMIC
